alert.note: Alert for Iron; Madison; Reynolds; St. Francois (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 8:28PM CDT until March 23 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Iron County in southeastern Missouri... Northeastern Reynolds County in southeastern Missouri... Madison County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Glover, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Glover around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ironton, Arcadia, Roselle, Fredericktown, Junction City, Cobalt and Knob Lick. This also includes Fort Davidson Historic Site and Taum Sauk Mountain State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
